numbers.title: Only numbers
numbers.text: Indicates the exact fret. '0' is an open string. It's impossible to get lost!

strings.title: For your instrument
strings.text: Automatically adapts to guitar, bass, ukulele, and more stringed instruments.

leftToRight.title: Smart fingering
leftToRight.text: Our algorithm finds the easiest position so your fingers don't suffer.

features.title: Designed for your musical success
features.subtitle: Tools that accelerate your progress and make practice fun.

simplify.title: Simplify mode
simplify.text: Too complex? Reduce chords and keep the essence to learn faster.

smartTabs.title: Smart fingering
smartTabs.text: Automatic neck optimization for smooth and effortless playing.

instruments.title: Multi-instrument
instruments.text: From 5-string bass to soprano ukulele. All in one application.

loop.title: A-B loop
loop.text: Select a difficult passage and repeat it until it's perfect.

speed.title: Variable speed
speed.text: Lower the tempo without changing the pitch. Ideal for mastering solos in slow motion.

themes.title: Premium aesthetics
themes.text: Over 30 visual themes. Choose the one that best suits your practice style.

howItWorks.title: Three steps to master your song
howItWorks.subtitle: From file to your fingers in less than a minute.

step1.title: 1. Import MIDI

step2.title: 2. Configure your view
step2.text: Choose your instrument, adjust the visual theme, and activate simplify mode if needed.

step3.title: 3. Start playing!
